title: Animation example using AsStream()
body: I read Miguel writing on using AsStream() to deliver animation using SkiaSharp. Could someone provide a link to codes or recipe on how to do that. A self-made Xamarin example/sample using Forms would be a GREAT help!

comments.author: ghost
comments.body: I would love to see this too 😄

comments.author: mattleibow
JimSEOW
comments.body:
I am looking for a way to use SkiaSharp to draw on UrhoSharp Texture to create a smooth dynamic texture. (independent of the OpenGL discussion, but exploring what could be the fast way to update urhoSharp Texture)

References
https://forums.xamarin.com/discussion/66204/using-skia-with-existing-opengl-context

comments.author: JimSEOW
comments.body:
I think there is need to figure out best practice to implement smooth animation using SkiaSharp. I am curious if AsStream is a good option. If so, how to implement in async way 

Reference
https://forums.xamarin.com/discussion/61920/skiasharp-for-animation

comments.author: migueldeicaza
comments.body:
This is off-topic for SkiaSharp.

SkiaSharp's sole goal is to give you a 2D drawing API, if you want to animate the results, that belongs in a higher design level.
